title: Did Pat Robertson Say ‘Staring’ at Melania Trump ‘Can Heal Gays’?
subtitle: A 'hybrid' fake news site built on real comments made by Pat Robertson to assert the televangelist  said looking at Melania Trump could 'cure gays.'
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Televangelist Pat Robertson said "staring" at First Lady Melania Trump could "cure gays."
